name: decky-stt-keyboard
description: Speech-to-text virtual keyboard plugin for Steam Deck

scripts.prepare_dist: pnpm run build && shx rm -rf build && shx mkdir -p build/decky-stt-keyboard/dist && shx cp dist/index.js build/decky-stt-keyboard/dist/ && shx cp package.json plugin.json LICENSE README.md build/decky-stt-keyboard/ && shx cp backend/src/main.py build/decky-stt-keyboard/ && shx cp -r defaults build/decky-stt-keyboard/
scripts.package: pnpm run prepare_dist && cd build && zip -r ../decky-stt-keyboard.zip decky-stt-keyboard
